item.description:
We postponed this trip from early June to the next Wednesday timeslot available in deference to the WAPA meeting on weather (a good thing in this area of the country!).

Gary & Carla have hinted at hosting a flight to Laconia in July and meeting us at the marina near the airport. So we need to prep the controllers and FBO (SkyBright) ahead of time for our gaggle of airplanes out of KFIT headed for Winnipesaukee.

It's a lovely 64-mile flight north over the New Hampshire hills and lakes and back under the stars. I'll make arrangements for the van, if someone else finds a good, inexpensive restaurant nearby!

Your host will be preflighting the Warrior at Twin City rampside. Wheels off the runway at 5:30-600. See you there!

Laconia Airport (KLCI)
item.how_to_find_us: show up at the terminal, Twin City rampside, Charley's hangar, or the active runway...You'll find us

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: It's Wednesday and we're still going to Laconia, Folks
